name: Beedrill
flavorText:
It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and
its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

previous.name: Kakuna
previous.flavorText:
Almost incapable
of moving, this
POKéMON can only harden its shell
to protect itself
from predators.

next.name: Pidgey
next.flavorText:
A common sight in
forests and woods.
It flaps its wings at ground
level to kick up
blinding sand.

pokemon.name: Weedle
pokemon.flavorText:
Often found in
forests, eating
leaves. It has a sharp
venomous stinger
on its head.

of moving, this

to protect itself
from predators.
